1134650.name: Escape Room Sim
1134650.description:
Escape Room Sim, brings your love for the classic genre into glorious 3d*. Pitting you up against elaborate escape rooms with the future potential to build your very own.

Initially scoped as a single player game with future plans for editable rooms, multiplayer, co-op and team play options.
Affect and alter your rooms by manipulating objects and navigating the puzzles in order to escape.

*Trailer and screenshots show actual in-game footage, but may not be representative of the final product.
*New screenshots showcase the Scifi theme*

ESCAPE ROOM SIM: FUTURE


We also see a big future for Escape Room Sim with aims to get it onto all major consoles along with a VR version and potential as an educational game / tool which is why we're making it super easy to build and manipulate rooms using a variety of methods.

One of the really exciting aspects planned are the themes, which a number will be released initially (including Classic Escape Room, Primitive (shown in the video) and Scifi) and we'll release more over time to let you build and escape rooms with complete creative freedom. In the future we also plan to add the ability to mod and upload your own objects and theme data giving you even more creative control.

  • Build Escape Rooms
  • Manipulate and build rooms using an array of tools / programming aids
  • Play with Physics
  • Manage Your Virtual Escape Room Empire
  • Publish Escape Rooms for others to play
  • Sim Management Mode
  • Programming aids
  • Visual Scripting for your rooms
  • IDE / console style coding

MULTIPLAYER / CO-OP


  • Escape Rooms
  • Build Rooms alone / with others
  • Manage Your Virtual Escape Room Empire
  • Watch others escape
  • Engineer Rooms
  • Escape with your friends or run around team stylee taking it in turns or escaping rooms together
  • Control and monitor your own rooms while others play them (this will need to be switched on, on a per room basis displayed prominently under the description of the room - allowing people to opt-in to this style of play)
  • Manipulate and build rooms using an array of tools / programming aids
  • Publish Escape Rooms for others to play
  • Upload your own objects / theme data

We will release more about each element over time. Hopefully you are as excited about the future of Escape Room Sim as we are!

If you are, then you know what to do! =D

Thank you for your support. It means the world to us!

~ Liam
